text: Given that Reverse (L, M) = {wefa, b}* | w €(LRn MR)}. Quotient (L, M) = {w | wx € L and x € M} IfL = a*b* and M = b* then which of the following statement is/are true? (a) Reverse (L, M) is equivalent to M. (b) Reverse (L, M) is equivalent to MR. (c) Quotient (L, M) is equivalent to a*. (d) Quotient (L, M) is equivalent to L.
